Package ss.project.players

Class ComputerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.project.players.Player
      • ss.project.players.ComputerPlayer
  • public class ComputerPlayer
extends Player
    A computer player which encapsulates a strategy and plays according to the strategy. A model class as it models an AI player.
    Author:
    Alex Petrov (s2478412) and Kagan Gulsum (s2596091)

    • Method Detail

      • determineMove

        public int[] determineMove​(Board board)
        A method to determine the move of the AI via the strategy.
        Specified by:
        determineMove in class Player
        Parameters:
        board - The board onto which the move will be determined.
        Returns:
        An integer array where the first value is the first move to make, and the second value (if not -1) is the second move to make.
        Requires
        board != null
        Ensures
        \result[0] >= 0 && 27 >= \result[0] && \result[1] >= -1 && 27 >= \result[1]
